topic-2.user_query: I always feel that my writing efficiency is too low. Is there any way to improve it?
implicit_needs: Users need to master more efficient tool usage skills to optimize their creative workflow.
The user hopes to enhance focus and productivity by improving time management and work habits.
topic-2.requirement: The user requires a customized solution that includes advanced training for commonly used writing tools, along with time management and energy allocation recommendations tailored to their daily routine. This aims to enhance manuscript creation efficiency and alleviate fatigue.

pos: 选择一款适合自己的思维导图软件（如XMind），用它来搭建文章的大纲和逻辑链条，加快构思速度。
采用双屏或多设备协同工作模式，一屏显示参考资料，另一屏进行写作，降低频繁切换窗口带来的干扰。
neg: Establish a fixed daily routine, avoid writing late at night, and set clear work time blocks to help the brain form conditioned reflexes, thereby enhancing focus.
Join a writers' support group to regularly share progress and insights, develop good writing habits under external supervision, and receive feedback and support.

candidate_solutions.solution: Learn and master all functions of a mainstream text editing software (such as Scrivener), particularly its structured writing module, to reduce time spent on formatting adjustments.
Use the Pomodoro Technique to schedule daily writing tasks, focusing on one segment of content for 25 minutes at a time, then taking a 5-minute break to alleviate fatigue and maintain efficiency.
Establish a fixed daily routine, avoid staying up late to write, and set clear work periods to condition the brain for improved focus.
Set aside one day each week specifically for organizing notes, refining frameworks, and preparing writing materials for the upcoming week in advance, to reduce the occurrence of getting stuck midway.
Choose a mind mapping software that suits you (such as XMind) and use it to build the outline and logical chain of the article, thereby speeding up the brainstorming process.

Adopt a dual-screen or multi-device collaborative work mode, where one screen displays reference materials and the other is used for writing, reducing the distraction caused by frequent window switching.
Record the frequency of task switching during each writing session, analyze which activities are most time-consuming, and optimize the process accordingly, such as by combining similar tasks.
Join a writers' support group to regularly share progress and insights, develop good writing habits under external supervision, and receive feedback and support.
